Tests that media query stack is rendered for associated rules.

Main style:
[expanded] 
element.style { ()

[expanded] 
#main { (media-queries.css:6 -> media-queries.css:6:14)
    color: yellow;

[expanded] 
#main { (media-queries-1.css:6 -> media-queries-1.css:6:12)
    border: 1px solid black;

[expanded] 
#main { (<style>)
    background: blue;

[expanded] 
div { (user agent stylesheet)
    display: block;
